# actuarialpricing

The goal of actuarialpricing is to give analytic techniques that can be used in insurance rating, in particular in actuarial pricing models in P&C insurance.  

## Installation

You can install actuarialpricing from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MHaringa/actuarialpricing")
```
